name: KToast
body:
### Welcome to KToast.
KToast for iOS - is an Android like Toast control developed for iOS 5+ and published under MIT license. We are maintaining this control using GitHub and you can fork it for development here.

```
$ cd your_repo_root/repo_name
$ git clone https://github.com/krupalghorpade/KToast.git
```

If you're using the GitHub for Mac, simply sync your repository and you'll see the new branch.

### System Requirements!
This control is developed with Xcode 5 and compatible with iOS 5.0, tested on iOS 6 and iOS 7.
It also requires a `CoreGraphics` framework to be linked with your project.

### Authors and Contributors
Developer - [Krupal Ghorpade](http://krupalghorpade.blogspot.in/).

### Support or Contact
Having trouble with KToast? contact krupalghorpade@gmail.com and weâ€™ll help you sort it out.
